translations: n.门户网站；[建]入口；大门（portal 的复数）

phrs.translation: 门式钢架；桥门构架；龙门架；桥门架
门静脉系统；门脉循环；门脉系统
隧道入口，隧道洞口；隧道口

sentences.sentence: Portals attempt to create what they call sticky content to keep a user as long as possible.
sentences.translation: 门户网站试图创建他们所谓的粘性内容，以尽可能长时间地留住用户。

sentences.sentence: It is people who run portals.
It is people who use portals.
